Treatment options include surgery, radiation, and/or chemotherapy. Regular exams after treatment are important.    Treatments may also cause infertility. If you may want children later on, you should consider sperm banking before treatment.    NIH: National Cancer Institute",MPlusHealthTopics,Testicular Cancer
